moves.1. Nc3: I saw this opening move when I was only starting my chess, and that old guy really beat all the people he had encounter.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. g3: Then from here, I notice that he will not use that attack....
moves.3... e4: then from here, i just sacrifice my pwan to make an opening...
moves.4. Nxe4 d5 5. Neg5 Nf6 6. e3 Bg4 7. Bb5: here was my mistake...instead of Queen, I push my knight to attack..so the bishop just terminate my other knight then it gives me a double pawn..
moves.11... Bb4+ 12. c3: then from here, it gives me nerves to move my official as I know that I will control the game from this point...
moves.12... Nxc3 13. Qb3 a5 14. bxc3 Bxc3+: then a double check which will leads to his Tower to be terminated..
moves.15. Ke2 Bxa1 16. Qb7 O-O 17. Qxc7: as I anticipate this move, I let him to catct 1 pawn then my attack..
moves.17... d4 18. Ba3 Rfc8 19. Qb6 Rcb8: from here it ends as he resign..he mistakenly pawned my pawn..
